name: Karma (itch) (Poly Gamers)
description:
Welcome to Karma!

Karma is a First-Person Shooting game that gives players an awesome FPS experience while exploring different maps, skills trees, and customizable elements in RPG crawlers.

Game Features Karma has 3 levels, 5 bosses, and 22 different enemies for players to challenge. Karma has a weapon system like Control. With 13 weapons, 9 attachments, 6 runes, and up to 5 rarities and elemental types for players to collect. Karma has a stats system like Dark Souls.
Players could kill enemies to level up and customize Health, Armor, Damage, and Resistance. Karma has skill trees like BorderLands.
With 4 elemental branches, 5 attachment skills, 12 passive skills, and 17 active skills for players to unlock.Game Play

There are three levels in Karma. Players need to find the hidden teleporters at each level and defeat the boss in order to process to the next level.

The portal will be open when the bosses at each level are defeated.

The bosses are very strong, however, you could kill enemies to level up and earn skill points. Allocating your stats and learning skills is crucial. (Press TAB to open inventory and  learn the Green buffing skills on the right side would be helpful)

If you need help with audio,  keybindings, or video quality, press ESC to view them.

Note! 

There are two cheat keys. Player could press 'O' to kill every regular enemy at the current level (for a fast level up). Player could also press 'P' to kill both bosses at the current level (to proceed to the next level).

Appendix:Karma is created By PolyGamers, a team of three college students from OSU.

Karma is awarded "The Best Game" and "The Most Polished Game" of the semester capstone by voting.
